column4: Hello. I was wondering if it's possible to do a minimal install of Ubuntu (just the OS without the GUI) and install a custom GUI on top of it?
sure, there is a minimal iso
yeah, minimal is great for that, get it installed, setup networking (wired makes this waaay easier) then install openbox and go make some food :)
if you open sound properties you can change the sound theme
there are sound themes in the repos as far as I am aware
I guess if you find the file you can just replace it
that's what I'm thinking too. I was hoping someone here could direct me to where it is lol.
is the pwd in the folder or a subfolder?
if you run:   pwd   it will tell you the path you are currently standing in
ok is the partition healthy? If it is NTFS was it gracefully unmounted when it was last removed from a system
the partition is fine. I'm thinking when transferring my files it may have gotten moved around though.
the panels factoid shows how to reset one folder in gconf. Just change the item reset to /  then logout and login and you should get vanilla settingz
check the appdb for the games you want to play
